body.name: Portable Washing Machine, 15L Mini Washing Machine Washer with Auto-Water, Foldable & Powerful Washer for Apartment, RV, Laundry, Camping, Travel, Hotel, Underwear, Personal, Baby, Pet (Pink)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 8 hrs 17 mins
features: 【15L Large Capacity】 Our portable washing machine is larger when unfolded 12.7 x 12.7 x 14.6 inches, smaller when folded 12.7 x 12.7 x 6.3 inches, light weight and easy to carry anywhere! The drain basket of our mini washing machine is also foldable, making it easier to store in small spaces. Our portable washer use industrial top food-grade TPE material, which is durable, sturdy and healthier.

【Strong Spins & Deep Cleans】Our portable washing machine is equipped with an industrial-grade top motor that delivers high power and speed for your laundry. Additionally, the anti-falling design of the drain basket in our mini washer provides a superior cleaning experience! (High-speed circles can ensure good draining, but incorrect usage can easily cause the basket to detach. So Pls always balance and compress laundry when draining & attach the drain basket tightly to the bottom 3 T-shapes.)

【Saver Time & Easy to Use】Our mini washing machine is one-touch design and have clean laundry in as little as 10 min. When you choose the auto-watering feature: The "STANDARD" mode works 4 washes for deep cleaning; The "QUICK WASH" mode means a crazy 4 washes in 20 min; During this time, you can enjoy your life carefree, unlike other portable washer that require manual intervention to start washing repeatedly. (PS. No need to put in the drainage basket when washing clothes; And the water level should never exceed "MAX" mark.)

【Auto Water or Manual Pouring】Our mini portable washing machine is smart: it can fit most taps (Tap ≤ 1/2"). The auto water inflow and drainage function can save your energy. Of course, you can also choose the "MANUAL WASH" program, which works as long as there is water. Our mini washer is 100V-240V and can be used globally! So our portable washer can adapt to more scenarios: apartment, RV, camping, travel, hotel or business trip.

【1 Year Warranty】Our mini washer comes with a 100V-240V adapter which is very convenient and can be used globally. Our portable washer can provide 1 year warranty, please contact us if you have any questions, we will provide you with satisfactory customer service. Contact Us: Log into your Amazon account > select "Your Orders" > find the order ID > click "Contact Seller".

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 15L Larger Capacity Washer, a Game-Changer for Small Spaces and Busy Lives! Enjoy Our Portable Washing Machine, Embrace a High-Quality Life!

The correct way to use our drain basket is: Please always balance and compress laundry when drying, and attach the drain basket tightly to the bottom 3 T-shapes. ( High-speed rotation ensures good draining effect, but incorrect placement of clothes can easily lead to imbalance at high speed and cause the basket to detach from the bottom of the washing machine. )

THE CORRECT USAGE OF OUR PORTABLE WASHING MACHINE： WARNING: 1. The "STANDARD", "QUICK WASH" and "MANUAL WASH" do not require a drain basket. Only the "DRAIN" program requires the basket! 2. To avoid basket detaches: Always balance and compress clothes when drying, and attach the drain basket tightly to the bottom 3 T-shapes! 3. Do not immerse the bottom of the washer in any liquid! Auto-water: 1. Ensure your faucet/tap is properly connected to our tap connector, and the inlet and outlet pipes are also installed; 2. Load your clothes into the washer and press the start button. Choose the "STANDARD" or "QUICK WASH" setting. Wait for the beep indicating; 3. Install the folding drain basket and place the washed clothes inside. Flatten and compress the clothes. Attach the basket to the 3 "T" shapes on the bottom of the washing machine; 4. Start the "DRAIN" function and wait for the beep to signal completion. Manual Pouring: 1. Pour water manually into the washer, being careful not to exceed the "MAX" mark; 2. Press the start button. Press again to select the "MANUAL WASH" program and wait for it to finish; 3. Place the clothes into the drain basket and attach the basket to the bottom of the washing machine; 4. Start the "DRAIN" process and wait for it to finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mini washing machine that does it's job
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best product's that I've purchased in many of years ! What more can I say , this is a great product and it is truly a must buy .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good and but,
reviews.reviewText: this nice little washer is actually works but for socks, panties, bra, and if you wash shirts its like piece by piece, it does work it does wash, and the dryer spinner is kind of disappointing for me because it always lift the basket so i have to manually stop it from spinning, i recommend this for people who dont wash weekly so they can use this for panties and socks only,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First of all, the box with the product had double tape, a sure sign (usually) that the item had been opened and/or used before.But, I went ahead, opened it, read the instructions and put it together.1. No, you can't manually fill it, you have to use the filler hose.2. Once you put the filler hose into the washer you can't remove it. Maybe the 250, 6'3" neighbor might be able but I used my old mini washer (diff. company) almost daily and I'm not going to bother him every single day.3. filler hose cannot be pulled ouf the doohinky that's supposed to fit your faucet, which it didn't. F**** water everywhere. grrrr4. trying to pack it up for return near impossible because the dang filler hose can't be pulled out and you can't fold it to it's tiniest shape because the stupid hose is in the way.I'm going back and buyig my cheap little unit again. It might be too small and take me more loads than I want to do but at least i know it will work.horrible experiece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wouldn't suction to countertop and too much work!
reviews.reviewText: This unit wouldn't suction to my countertop in my RV. My countertop is sort of rough and the suction cups on the bottom of the unit would not adhere. Therefore, when the Drain/Spin started, the unit would shake right off the countertop if I had not hung on really tight. Also, you can only put one or two items in the drain/spin basket. If you put too much in, the basket will detach from the bottom of the unit. In the end, it would be easier and quicker just to wash the items by hand. Sending it back.

reviews.reviewerName: Excelente proyector, tiene muy buen sonido para interior y su imagen de día como de noche se ve muy bien. Una buena compra a un buen precio.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Es como una lavadora de las grandes, lava muy bien y el centrifugado es genial.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars ugly weird color of peach 🤮🤢🤮🤢🤮not pink
reviews.reviewText: This is not pink not even baby pink it is a weird peach, color not true peach has a little bit of something in it. That's throwing the color off i'm guessing it was a factory mishap so my bucket is a color misfit🥴 🤮🤢 color does not go with my bathroom at all if I would've known, it was more peach I would've bought the white and gray bucket as you can see with the pictures the difference between peach and pink that is a disappointment🥵 The upgrade is the fact that its automatic, if the adapter will fit, your sink I'm using it manually. I already have a larger, portable washer with a bidet sink sprayer that is attached to my faucet for filling so I will not benefit from the automatic features on this machine If you're using this in the manual mode it washes for about 10 minutes and then will drain automatically. I don't like this because I want more wash time there are no increments of time as the picture indicates so I leave the hose up after the 10 minutes since the hose is up, it does not go into the automatic drain cycle what I do is I turn the machine off and then turn it back on and give it another 10 minutes to wash I think it would be best to use this in the automatic mode if you're able to do so in the manual mode l feel like I need more than 10 minutes to get my clothes clean without it automatically draining. I had to buy this because my socks, even in a zippered bag were disappearing from my portable, washer if the bag comes unzipped, then the washer has eaten my socks. Also with the portable washer clothes are a tangled mess. I always use the bags but a lot of times they come unzipped the agitation is good the basket did stay on. I have only used this once I just got it. I will update my review after I have used it for a while and see how it doesUpdated review! There are some nice features on this machine. There is some semi automatic options that you have in the manual mode. This would be a really great machine. If you wanted to use it in the automatic mode, you wouldn't be filling the bucket, draining the bucket it is totally automatic and the price is nice I have enough trust in this machine I'm not babysitting it I just got done using it for the second time, I decided to order another one because of the quality the basket didn't fly off I was able to add a couple of drain cycles or for extra spinning time The clothes are not sopping wet. They are wet, but not dripping wet. You would be able to hang them with no problem and let them dry overnight. I think I like this machine. The machine that I'm getting is the white and gray I'm keeping this I'll keep this in my bathroom and then I'll have one out in the kitchen for towels things I need to wash quick when I make a mess etc. give this a try I think that you can make this work in the automatic mode. With your sink, you might have to do some improvising, but I believe it can be doneSome updates so I've used it again the basket flew off a couple of times you'll have to make sure that your clothes are balanced. You will have to probably make sure that you're not too far away from the washer in case the basket does come off you will have to turn off the machine, it serves its purpose. The basket doesn't do well overloaded.The basket staying on is going to be a 50-50 thing. It's not quite a dealbreaker but the more I'm using it I'm seeing the basket flaw, which is a constant complaint with these portable washers there has to be some way that the basket actually hooks or has a mechanism to hold the basket in placeUpdate I gave up on trying to get that basket to stay on. I have a portable washer. I use that spinner to spin dry my clothes. If you can keep the basket from coming off, then you should play the lottery. Your luck is enormous.

The media could not be loaded. Apenas la recibí y la probé, la puse en modo manual ya que no la he conectado a la llave, lavó bastante bien y centrifuga con fuerza para ser pequeña pero si tienes que buscar un lugar donde ponerla y que se adhiera bien al piso porque cuando empieza a centrifugar se mueve mucho. Si dejó la ropa sin agua escurriendo. Es de fácil armado. Para varias prendas pequeñas . Por el momento muy contenta con mi compra.
